title: Glossary Example Book
text:
0.1 Overview
This Quarto book demonstrates collecting glossary terms across multiple chapters.
Continue to Chapter 1 for more Filter usage.

title: 2  Chapter 1: Filters
text:
Filters are a core part of Quarto publishing.
When you apply a Filter pipeline, Quarto transforms content during rendering.

title: 3  Chapter 2: Projects
text:
A Quarto project can include many chapters and shared metadata.
This chapter references the Filter term again to confirm linking.

title: 4  Glossary
text:
Quarto
An open-source scientific and technical publishing system.


Filter
A script that transforms a document during rendering.
